subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Taiwan, South Korea and Canada will play baseball at the Beijing Olympics after finishing in the top three at a qualifying tournament Friday in Taipei, Taiwan. Canada and South Korea had 6-1 records; Taiwan was 5-2.The United States, Cuba, the Netherlands and Japan won earlier qualifying tournaments. China received an automatic bid as the host nation.
